template<class T>
Array2D< T >::Array2D ( const Array2D< T > &  v  )  [inline, inherited]

Creates a new 2-dimensional array with the structure and content of the constant 2-dimensional array "v".

Memory for the pointer matrix ptrArrM will be allocated.

Parameters:
v 2-dimensional array, whose content will be copied to the new array
Returns:
none
Author:
M. Kreutz
Date:
2001-04-24

Array2D< T >::Array2D ( const Array< T > &  v  )  [inline, inherited]

Creates a new 2-dimensional array with the structure and content of the constant array "v".

Memory for the pointer matrix ptrArrM will be allocated.

Parameters:
v array, whose content will be copied to the new array
Returns:
none
Exceptions:
check_exception the type of the exception will be "size mismatch" and indiactes that v is no 2-dimensional or non-dimensional array

template<class T>
Array2D< T >::Array2D ( unsigned  i,
unsigned  j 
) [inline, inherited]

Creates a new 2-dimensional array with "i" rows and "j" columns.

A 2-dimensional array is created and memory for the pointer matrix ptrArrM is allocated.

Parameters:
i number of rows of the new array
j number of columns of the new array
Returns:
none

This constructor is for internal usage only.

template<class T>
ArrayBase* Array2D< T >::empty (  )  const [inline, virtual, inherited]

Returns an empty 2-dimensional array with the same type as this Array2D object.

A new empty Array2D object with the same type as the current array is created and a pointer to this new object returned.

Returns:
an empty copy of the current array
Author:
M. Kreutz
Date:
2001-04-24
